revised_title: Effects of Cod-Liver Oil on Red Corpuscles in Blood
tldr: The author investigates the changes in the proportion of red corpuscles in the blood when cod-liver oil is administered. They found that an increase in the proportion of red corpuscles is associated with the administration of cod-liver oil, leading to improved health in patients with phthisis. The author also discusses the process of blood analysis and the role of red corpuscles in the body.
